price: Wͻkaa sε: “Ma no ne onua no nwͻ hͻ, (anaa wͻntwεn) na soma dawubͻfoͻ wͻ nkuro no so (ma wͻnkͻ boaboa nkonyaayifoͻ ano),
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
